Government
==========

Please take a look at the sub-sections in the navigation menu for the more specific areas of Government.

![Woodville, TX](https://www.woodville-tx.gov/repository/designs/templates/GO_woodville-tx_2024_resp/images/title.png)
400 W. Bluff Street Woodville, Texas 75979
Ph. (409) 283-2234 Fax (409) 283-8412

#### Contact Us

Hours 8:00 a.m. - 4:30 p.m. Monday - Friday (closed noon -12:30 p.m. for lunch)
If you are in need of assistance after hours and on weekends call (409) 283-2172
